successes.title: Everpurse: seamlessly charge your phone all day
successes.description: Everpurse charges your smartphone (compatible with iPhone 4, iPhone 5, and Samsung Galaxy S3) all day without wires.

Pledges.description: EARLY BIRD FABRIC SPECIAL: You've had enough dead calls and missed pictures, you want one now! Save a bunch by being one of the first to buy! You get one fabric Everpurse + one charging mat. You can choose from 3 colors. US Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us. Retail Value: $175

EARLY BIRD LEATHER SPECIAL: You've had enough dead calls and missed pictures, you want one now! Save a bunch by being one of the first to buy! You get a leather Everpurse + one charging mat. You can choose from 3 colors. US Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us. Retail Value: $230

ORIGINAL FABRIC: Yes! You want to join an exclusive club of never-out-of-battery super femmes (or men). We don't blame you. Get one fabric Everpurse + a charging mat in any of 3 beautiful colors. Want your Everpurse with a cross-body strap? Add 15 to your pledge. US Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us. Retail Value: $175

+ FABRIC COLORS: Be part of the team and join in voting for the next fabric color! At this level you get a fabric Everpurse, + one charging mat. You can also vote for your favorite color and get your Everpurse in your choice of one of the winning or original colors. US Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us. Retail Value: $200

ORIGINAL LEATHER: Never out of power and always looking great! You get a leather Everpurse + one charging mat in one of 3 gorgeous colors. US Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us. Retail value: $230

+ LEATHER COLORS: What? More leather colors too? Get a Leather Everpurse + charging mat and be a part of the process. Vote for your favorite color and get your Everpurse in your choice of one of the winning or original colors. US Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us. Retail value: $255

GOOD MORNING AMERICA SPECIAL: Loved the blue and green croc bags on GMA? Us too! You get a leather Everpurse + one charging mat in either blue or green croc-embossed leather! US Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us. Retail value: $320

MEN WHO WANT TO BE RELEASED FROM CHARGING THEIR SPECIAL SOMEONE'S SMARTPHONE PACK:  
1 Leather Everpurse (in any available color) + 2 Charging Mats. Make sure that your Mom, GF, Wife, Daughter, Sister, or S.O. are never out of battery again. Whether at work or at home you know you can always get in touch with them. US Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us. Retail value: $315

FABRIC BFF: 2 Fabric Everpurses + 2 charging mats. Be a part of the process and vote for your favorite color. Get your Everpurses in your choice of winning or original colors. US Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us. Retail value: $400

LEATHER BFF: 2 Leather Everpurses + 2 charging mats. Be a part of the process and vote for your favorite color. Get your Everpurses in your choice of winning or original colors. US Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us. Retail value: $510

FABULOUS FEMME CHRISTMAS GIFT: Want us to custom retrofit your bag with Everpurse technology? Not a problem! Send us your purse in the mail and we'll send it back all decked out! Customize your mat with a personalized love note or special someone's name. (Youâ€™ll need to send us pictures and dimensions of your purse first!) US Insured Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us.

BOUTIQUE LEATHER PACK: Get 10 leather Everpurses + 10 charging mats in any of the available colors, including the winning voter's choice colors! US Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us. Retail value: $2,550

CORPORATE LEATHER PACK: Ensure your team never runs out of battery again! Get 10 leather Everpurses + 10 charging mats in any of the available colors, including the winning voter's choice colors! Customize your mat with your company's logo. US Shipping included. We ship international! Contact us. Retail value: $3,000

OUTFIT YOUR LINE: Want to put Everpurse technology into your bags? We will fly to you, work with you, provide you with samples, and personally guide how to get Everpurse technology in your next line of bags. Retail Value: Priceless
